Text: Dime novel:  The term was used as a title as late as 1940, in the short-lived pulp magazine "Western Dime Novels".

4:
--------------------
Text: Dime novel:  In the modern age, the term "dime novel" has been used to refer to quickly written, lurid potboilers, usually as a pejorative to describe a sensationalized but superficial literary work.
Triplets:<dime novel
